rows.label: bf11270100_0010
rows.name: So you're the one.

rows.label: bf11270100_0020
rows.name: The future king of Iira

rows.label: bf11270100_0025
rows.name: I am truly glad I sent a messenger.

rows.label: bf11270100_0030
rows.name: Coming from you, that's not funny.

rows.label: bf11270100_0035
rows.name: I don't want to make waves back home.

rows.label: bf11270100_0040
rows.name: I'm only a deacon. I have no influence.

rows.label: bf11270100_0050
rows.name: If that's all you were, maybe.

rows.label: bf11270100_0060
rows.name: Her Core Crystal is a different color.

rows.label: bf11270100_0065
rows.name: And a woman, no less.

rows.label: bf11270100_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11270100_0080
rows.name: Quite lovely, indeed.

rows.label: bf11270100_0085
rows.name: Metsu was a huge, powerfully built man.

rows.label: bf11270100_0090
rows.name: Does that worry you?

rows.label: bf11270100_0100
rows.name: Quite the opposite, actually.

rows.label: bf11270100_0110
rows.name:
Everyone knows a Blade's power has nothing
to do with their appearance or gender.

rows.label: bf11270100_0120
rows.name: You could be the heroine of the resistance.

rows.label: bf11270100_0130
rows.name: I'm not planning on being anyone's poster girl.

rows.label: bf11270100_0140
rows.name: That's fine.

rows.label: bf11270100_0145
rows.name: I only have one thing to ask of you.

rows.label: bf11270100_0150
rows.name: That you correct my mistake...

rows.label: bf11270100_0160
rows.name: ...and have you bury that Metsu once and for all...
